movies.title: Mieletön elokuu
movies.plot: August Fools is a romantic comedy set against the political background of the Cold War. Elsa (), a middle-aged hat maker and part-time clairvoyant, is apparently in total control of her life - until the man she once loved and lost walks in through the door of her Helsinki hat shop in 1962. Jan (), a Czech jazz musician, is in town to perform at the "International Festival of Peace and Friendship of the Youth of the World." For more than two decades Elsa believed the man was dead. Elsa initially wants to stay away from Jan - and especially from the Festival, which for her is just another attempt by the International Communists to brainwash the good, unsuspecting citizens of Western countries, such as Finland. But Jan is persistent, persuasive and charming. As Elsa eventually overcomes her fear of love and commitment, she realizes there is only one solution if the two of them want to be together for more than the seven days of the Festival.

biography.bio: Kati Outinen was born on August 17, 1961 in Helsinki, Finland as Anna Katriina Outinen. She is an actress and writer, known for The Man Without a Past (2002), Le Havre (2011) and The Match Factory Girl (1990).
biography.name: Kati Outinen

biography.bio: Miroslav Etzler was born on December 22, 1964 in Ostrava, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Pojistovna stestí (2004), Cesty domú (2010) and Jak se krotí krokodýli (2006).
biography.name: Miroslav Etzler

biography.bio: Elena Leeve was born on February 1, 1983. She is an actress and writer, known for Falling Angels (2008), Le cracheur de feu (1998) and Beauty and the Bastard (2005).
biography.name: Elena Leeve

biography.bio: Krystof Hádek was born on March 10, 1982 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Under the Skin (2013), Dark Blue World (2001) and 3 Seasons in Hell (2009).
biography.name: Krystof Hádek

biography.bio: Esko Salminen was born on October 12, 1940 in Helsinki, Finland as Esko Kullervo Salminen. He is an actor, known for Ihmeidentekijät (1996), Blondi tuli taloon (1994) and Mother of Mine (2005). He is married to Aino Seppo. They have one child. He was previously married to Riikka Korppi-Tommola, Heidi Krohn and Rose-Marie Precht.
biography.name: Esko Salminen

biography.bio: Vesa Vierikko was born on May 24, 1956 in Lappeenranta, Finland as Vesa Tapio Vierikko. He is an actor and writer, known for Guerre d'hiver (1989), The Match Factory Girl (1990) and The Flight Before Christmas (2008). He was previously married to Ilona Lampi.
biography.name: Vesa Vierikko

biography.bio: Tommi Korpela was born on August 23, 1968 in Helsinki, Finland as Tommi Petteri Korpela. He is an actor and writer, known for Rare Exports: A Christmas Tale (2010), A Man's Job (2007) and Distractions (2015). He is married to Elina Knihtilä. They have one child.
biography.name: Tommi Korpela

biography.bio: Denny Ratajský is an actor, known for Baron rouge (2008), Red Tails (2012) and Mieletön elokuu (2013).
biography.name: Denny Ratajský

biography.placeOfBirth: Jablonec nad Nisou, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Petr Stach was born on June 29, 1974 in Jablonec nad Nisou, Czechoslovakia. He is known for his work on Major Case Squad (2014), A Walk Worthwhile (2009) and Tobruk (2008).
biography.name: Petr Stach

biography.placeOfBirth: Frýdlant v Cechách, Czechoslovakia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Jan Budar was born on July 31, 1977 in Frýdlant v Cechách, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor and writer, known for Boredom in Brno (2003), Après l'hiver (2007) and La mujer sin piano (2009).
biography.name: Jan Budar

biography.bio: Zdenek Maryska was born on April 17, 1947 in Marianské Lázne, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Sept jours à vivre (2000), The Prince and Me (2004) and Children of Dune (2003).
biography.name: Zdenek Maryska

biography.bio: Václav Jirácek was born on September 28, 1978 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor and writer, known for Guard No. 47 (2008), Shadows of the Deceased (2005) and Janosik, roi des voleurs (2009).
biography.name: Václav Jirácek

biography.bio: Cohlie Brocato is a cinematographer and actor, known for The Epic of Hershey (2015), Loaded (2017) and The Last Impression (2011).
biography.name: Cohlie Brocato

biography.bio: Pirkka-Pekka Petelius was born on May 31, 1953 in Tornio, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Pulttibois (1989), Team Ahma (1998) and Ou Nou! (2001). He was previously married to Sari Siikander.
biography.name: Pirkka-Pekka Petelius

biography.bio: Mads Sjøgård Pettersen is an actor and director, known for Eddie the Eagle (2016), Nobel (2016) and Lilyhammer (2012).
biography.name: Mads Sjøgård Pettersen
